actions.text: Referred to House Committee on House Administration.

official_title: A resolution authorizing the withholding of city income taxes from Members and employees of the House of Representatives.

summary.text: Authorizes the Clerk and the Sergeant at Arms of the House of Representatives to enter into agreement with any city to withhold city income tax in the case of each Member and employee of the House of Representatives who is subject to such income tax and who voluntarily requests such withholding. Prohibits any Member or employee from having in effect with a city at any time more than one request for withholding, or more than two such requests with respect to different cities during any one calendar year. Allows a Member or employee to change the city designation or revoke any request for such withholding.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing the withholding of city income taxes from Members and employees of the House of Representatives.
